column4: Hey guys I have a HP pavillion dv6000 with an atheros wifi card and just upgraded to hardy. i got it working in feisty but now it doesn't work. What went wrong?
what went wrong in the upgrade?
very often a restricted driver is replaced by a kernel module that might not work :(  only thing i can suggest is look in your restricted hardware manager or try ndiswrapper with windows drivers
i went through with what i did before and it says everything i was doing has already been done.
